def_cn: 职位（或地位）较低的；年资较浅的
def_en: A junior official or employee holds a low-ranking position in an organization or profession.
If you are someone's junior, you are younger than they are.

def_cn: 小（用于男子名后以区别于家族中同名的长辈，缩略形式为Jr）
def_en: Junior is sometimes used after the name of the younger of two men in a family who have the same name, sometimes in order to prevent confusion. The abbreviation Jr is also used.

def_cn: （美国高中或大学的）三年级学生
def_en: In the United States, a student in the third year of a high school or university course is called a junior.
